name: Raining Gold Slots
description:
Welcome to Raining Gold Slots! Raining Gold invites you to enjoy your favorite slot machines with exciting, classic, and real-world features and unbelievable Jackpots!

Incredible slot machines including:
- Pirate Bay
- Aztec
- Land of OZ
- Cleopatra
- Spartans
- Fortune Teller
- Chinese Fortunes
- Zeus
- Happy Easter
- Werewolf Legend
- Zombie Siege Survival
- Lucky Shuriken
- Aladdin
- Cinderella Dreams
- Santa Claus’s House
- Arctic King

Numerous ways to win Bonuses and Jackpots!
- Loving, exciting, and attractive stories to explore!
- Lots of slot machines bring you incredible experience!

Start your journey now and explore different and fantastic stories. Win the rewards and feel the charm of Raining Gold.

In Raining Gold’s brand new and spectacular slot machines, Free Spins and Wilds are provided for you to win more Jackpots!
Collect millions of free credits from hourly and daily events!

Reexperience various adventures and rediscover your passion for these stories!
Unlock more slot machines with your friends to unfold more stories.
The more slot machines you unlock, the more stories you can enjoy!

Explore Special Features of Raining Gold!
- So many exciting parts such as Bonus games, Free Spin, Luxury Chests, Jackpots, and Tournaments.
- Numerous rewards to claim.
- Countless ways to win the prizes.

Enjoy the Journey at Anywhere and Anytime!
- Log in with Facebook to continue the journey in all your devices.

Share with Friends While Playing Raining Gold
- Play live with your friends and exchange gifts.
- Compete with your friends in Tournaments.

It is the time to join Raining Gold and enjoy all the amazing online slot machines in this paradise of free slots!

Our game is for entertainment only and is intended for an adult audience (21+). All in-game sales are final. This game does not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at “real money gambling”.
